org.apache.flink.runtime.execution

Interface Environment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RuntimeEnvironment

    public interface Environment
    The user code of every Nephele task runs inside an Environment object. The environment provides important services to the task. It keeps track of setting up the communication channels and provides access to input splits, memory manager, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • getJobID

        JobID getJobID()
        Returns the ID of the job from the original job graph. It is used by the library cache manager to find the required libraries for executing the assigned Nephele task.
        Returns:
        the ID of the job from the original job graph

      • getOutputBufferProvider

        BufferProvider getOutputBufferProvider()
        Returns the buffer provider for this environment.

        The returned buffer provider is used by the output side of the network stack.

        Returns:
        Buffer provider for the output side of the network stack
        See Also:
        RecordWriter
